name: nsyld
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w3), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w3), wn(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wn(w3), wn(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wn(w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, w3))

comment: A negated syllogism deduction. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2005.)
